Oi, tudo bem? Sou David Andrade,

desenvolvedor, amante de matemática, lógica e queijo com goiabada. Vivo em Minas Gerais, Brasil. Onde as montanhas, tão altas, combrem-se brancas. Onde a terra, tão vermelha, sangra ouro.

Uai. Acha que é mágica?

Mágica são palavras ditas, escritas, palavras que a realidade escuta e o mundo executa. Bilhões de consequências. Todas ao pé da letra...

Então, programador, mago sou!

Prisoner's Dilemma

07 July 2023 | bash, Unix

Challenge independent agents in the infamous prisoner's dilemma.

Here we developed a bash script to allow you to run your own competition.

Make sure it's not too bloody.

Combat, navigation, equipment, shop, spells, quests, and what we can't miss, character statistics.

Castle Supremacy

04 July 2023 | — Android SDK, C#, Unity Server

We have developed a Mobile Card Game based on 'Ants' by Miroslav Němeček.

The game features player versus player, offered with Unity Server.

Ondaedes' Application

29 October 2023 | Mapbox, PostgreSQL, Python Flask

We developed and deployed Ondaedes' webpage where you can track the risk areas for the proliferation of the Aedes Aegypti mosquito. Enhanced with meteorological, demographic, and geographic data to help you plan and take actions against it.
